metadata.name: Invoke-Obfuscation Via Stdin
metadata.comment: Detects Obfuscated Powershell via Stdin in Scripts

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND process.cmd_line rlike '\(?i\)\(set\).*&&\\s?set.*\(environment|invoke|\\$\\\{?input\).*&&.*"')

output.summary: Detects Obfuscated Powershell via Stdin in Scripts
